001package com.technototes.library.hardware2;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap;
004import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
005
006/**
007 * TODO: Remove this. I don't believe this adds much value. Yeah, HardwareMap.get is weird, but
008 * it's in all the documentation, so just read it, see it in the examples, and you're done.
009 */
010@Deprecated
011public class HardwareBuilder<T> {
012
013    private static HardwareMap hardwareMap = null;
014
015    public static HardwareMap getMap() {
016        return hardwareMap;
017    }
018
019    /**
020     * Deprecated
021     *
022     * @param h deprecated
023     */
024    public static void initMap(HardwareMap h) {
025        // fix to maintain old code
026        com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice.hardwareMap = h;
027        hardwareMap = h;
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * Deprecated
032     *
033     * @param s   Deprecated
034     * @param <T> Deprecated
035     * @return Deprecated
036     */
037    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked cast")
038    public static <T> T create(String s) {
039        if (hardwareMap == null) return null;
040        return hardwareMap.get((Class<T>) Object.class, s);
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * Deprecated
045     *
046     * @param port Deprecated
047     * @param <T>  Deprecated
048     * @return Deprecated
049     */
050    // TODO
051    public static <T> T create(int port) {
052        if (hardwareMap == null) return null;
053        return null;
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Deprecated
058     */
059    protected T product;
060
061    /**
062     * Deprecated
063     *
064     * @param name Deprecated
065     */
066    public HardwareBuilder(String name) {
067        this(HardwareBuilder.<T>create(name));
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Deprecated
072     *
073     * @param device Deprecated
074     */
075    public HardwareBuilder(T device) {
076        product = device;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Deprecated
081     *
082     * @param port Deprecated
083     */
084    public HardwareBuilder(int port) {
085        this(HardwareBuilder.<T>create(port));
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Deprecated
090     *
091     * @param <U> Deprecated
092     * @return Deprecated
093     */
094    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked cast")
095    public <U extends T> U build() {
096        try {
097            return (U) product;
098        } catch (ClassCastException e) {
099            e.printStackTrace();
100            return null;
101        }
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Deprecated
106     *
107     * @param operator Deprecated
108     * @return Deprecated
109     */
110    public HardwareBuilder<T> apply(UnaryOperator<T> operator) {
111        product = operator.apply(product);
112        return this;
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * Deprecated
117     *
118     * @param name Deprecated
119     * @return Deprecated
120     */
121    public static AnalogBuilder analog(String name) {
122        return new AnalogBuilder(name);
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Deprecated
127     *
128     * @param name Deprecated
129     * @return Deprecated
130     */
131    public static ColorBuilder color(String name) {
132        return new ColorBuilder(name);
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Deprecated
137     *
138     * @param name Deprecated
139     * @return Deprecated
140     */
141    public static ColorRangeBuilder colorRange(String name) {
142        return new ColorRangeBuilder(name);
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Deprecated
147     *
148     * @param name Deprecated
149     * @return Deprecated
150     */
151    public static CRServoBuilder crServo(String name) {
152        return new CRServoBuilder(name);
153    }
154
155    /**
156     * Deprecated
157     *
158     * @param name Deprecated
159     * @return Deprecated
160     */
161    public static DigitalBuilder digital(String name) {
162        return new DigitalBuilder(name);
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Deprecated
167     *
168     * @param name Deprecated
169     * @return Deprecated
170     */
171    public static DistanceBuilder distance(String name) {
172        return new DistanceBuilder(name);
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Deprecated
177     *
178     * @param name Deprecated
179     * @return Deprecated
180     */
181    public static IMUBuilder imu(String name) {
182        return new IMUBuilder(name);
183    }
184
185    /**
186     * Deprecated
187     *
188     * @param name Deprecated
189     * @return Deprecated
190     */
191    public static MotorBuilder motor(String name) {
192        return new MotorBuilder(name);
193    }
194
195    /**
196     * Deprecated
197     *
198     * @param name Deprecated
199     * @return Deprecated
200     */
201    public static ServoBuilder servo(String name) {
202        return new ServoBuilder(name);
203    }
204
205    /**
206     * Deprecated
207     *
208     * @param port Deprecated
209     * @return Deprecated
210     */
211    public static AnalogBuilder analog(int port) {
212        return new AnalogBuilder(port);
213    }
214
215    /**
216     * Deprecated
217     *
218     * @param port Deprecated
219     * @return Deprecated
220     */
221    public static CRServoBuilder crServo(int port) {
222        return new CRServoBuilder(port);
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Deprecated
227     *
228     * @param port Deprecated
229     * @return Deprecated
230     */
231    public static DigitalBuilder digital(int port) {
232        return new DigitalBuilder(port);
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * Deprecated
237     *
238     * @param port Deprecated
239     * @return Deprecated
240     */
241    public static MotorBuilder motor(int port) {
242        return new MotorBuilder(port);
243    }
244
245    /**
246     * Deprecated
247     *
248     * @param port Deprecated
249     * @return Deprecated
250     */
251    public static ServoBuilder servo(int port) {
252        return new ServoBuilder(port);
253    }
254}
